languages.text: {n}Сложив руки на груди, Соломон наклоняется к прорези, его голос наполняется сталью.{/n} "Машины не могут бояться, "Когицор", — лишь безропотно принимать свою участь". {n}Поймав ваш взгляд, проктор чуть пожимает плечами.{/n} "Не удержался".

{n}Solomorne folds his arms and leans toward the slot, his voice ringing with steel:{/n} "Machines cannot feel fear, 'Cogicor.' They can only meekly accept their fate." {n}The Proctor catches your gaze and shrugs.{/n} "I couldn't help myself."
languages.original_text: {n}Сложив руки на груди, Соломон наклоняется к прорези, его голос наполняется сталью.{/n} "Машины не могут бояться, "Когицор", — лишь безропотно принимать свою участь". {n}Поймав ваш взгляд, проктор чуть пожимает плечами.{/n} "Не удержался".

{n}Solomorne folds his arms and leans toward the slot, his voice ringing with steel:{/n} "Machines cannot feel fear, 'Cogicor.' They can only meekly accept their fate." {n}The Proctor catches your gaze and shrugs.{/n} "I couldn't help myself."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙交叉双臂，朝箱子走了过去，声音铿锵有力。{/n}“机器是不会感到恐惧的，‘沉司哲’。它们只会顺从地接受命运。”{n}索罗蒙意识到你的目光之后，耸了耸肩。{/n}“我实在是有点忍不住了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms and leans toward the slot, his voice ringing with steel:{/n} "Machines cannot feel fear, 'Cogicor.' They can only meekly accept their fate." {n}The Proctor catches your gaze and shrugs.{/n} "I couldn't help myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙交叉双臂，朝箱子走了过去，声音铿锵有力。{/n}“机器是不会感到恐惧的，‘沉司哲’。它们只会顺从地接受命运。”{n}索罗蒙意识到你的目光之后，耸了耸肩。{/n}“我实在是有点忍不住了。”

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは腕を組み、スロットに向かって身を乗り出した。その声には鋼のような響きがあった。{/n}「機械なら恐怖を感じることはできないぞ、コギコル。機械はただ、おとなしく己の運命を受け入れるしかない」{n}代理人はあなたの視線に気づき、肩をすくめた。{/n}「我慢できなくて、つい」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms and leans toward the slot, his voice ringing with steel:{/n} "Machines cannot feel fear, 'Cogicor.' They can only meekly accept their fate." {n}The Proctor catches your gaze and shrugs.{/n} "I couldn't help myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは腕を組み、スロットに向かって身を乗り出した。その声には鋼のような響きがあった。{/n}「機械なら恐怖を感じることはできないぞ、コギコル。機械はただ、おとなしく己の運命を受け入れるしかない」{n}代理人はあなたの視線に気づき、肩をすくめた。{/n}「我慢できなくて、つい」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se cruza de brazos y se inclina hacia la ranura hasta que su voz reverbera en la superficie metálica:{/n} «Las máquinas no sienten miedo, "cogicor". Aceptan su destino y se someten dócilmente». {n}El Procurador nota tu mirada y se encoge de hombros.{/n} «No he podido contenerme».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms and leans toward the slot, his voice ringing with steel:{/n} "Machines cannot feel fear, 'Cogicor.' They can only meekly accept their fate." {n}The Proctor catches your gaze and shrugs.{/n} "I couldn't help myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se cruza de brazos y se inclina hacia la ranura hasta que su voz reverbera en la superficie metálica:{/n} «Las máquinas no sienten miedo, "cogicor". Aceptan su destino y se someten dócilmente». {n}El Procurador nota tu mirada y se encoge de hombros.{/n} «No he podido contenerme».

languages.text: {n}Kollarını kavuşturup deliğe doğru eğilen Solomorne'un sesi çelik gibi çınlıyor.{/n} "Makineler korku hissedemez 'Kavrasar'. Kaderlerini ancak uysalca kabul edebilirler." {n}Üsteğmen senin bakışlarını fark edip omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Kendimi tutamadım."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms and leans toward the slot, his voice ringing with steel:{/n} "Machines cannot feel fear, 'Cogicor.' They can only meekly accept their fate." {n}The Proctor catches your gaze and shrugs.{/n} "I couldn't help myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kollarını kavuşturup deliğe doğru eğilen Solomorne'un sesi çelik gibi çınlıyor.{/n} "Makineler korku hissedemez 'Kavrasar'. Kaderlerini ancak uysalca kabul edebilirler." {n}Üsteğmen senin bakışlarını fark edip omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Kendimi tutamadım."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne croise les bras et se penche vers la fente en déclarant d'une voix aussi tranchante que l'acier :{/n} « Les machines ne ressentent pas la peur, "Cogicor". Elles se contentent d'accepter leur sort. {n}Le proctor hausse les épaules en croisant votre regard.{/n} Désolé, je n'ai pas pu m'en empêcher. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms and leans toward the slot, his voice ringing with steel:{/n} "Machines cannot feel fear, 'Cogicor.' They can only meekly accept their fate." {n}The Proctor catches your gaze and shrugs.{/n} "I couldn't help myself."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne croise les bras et se penche vers la fente en déclarant d'une voix aussi tranchante que l'acier :{/n} « Les machines ne ressentent pas la peur, "Cogicor". Elles se contentent d'accepter leur sort. {n}Le proctor hausse les épaules en croisant votre regard.{/n} Désolé, je n'ai pas pu m'en empêcher. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne lehnt sich mit verschränkten Armen nach vorne und verkündet mit stählerner Stimme:{/n} "Maschinen können keine Furcht empfinden, 'Cogicor.' Sie können lediglich ihr Schicksal akzeptieren." {n}Als sich eure Blicke treffen, zuckt der Proktor mit den Schultern.{/n} "Ich konnte nicht anders."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne folds his arms and leans toward the slot, his voice ringing with steel:{/n} "Machines cannot feel fear, 'Cogicor.' They can only meekly accept their fate." {n}The Proctor catches your gaze and shrugs.{/n} "I couldn't help myself."
